DEMO_210_MSG_010:
̄It looks like this is all that remains... Bundold knew what we were after, it would seem.
ā
DEMO_210_MSG_020: ̄The message from the mysterious girl was sent from the device in this room.
DEMO_210_MSG_030:
̄The Security Code to the back gate should assist you. With it, the sealed door to the Transport Device should open.
ā
DEMO_210_MSG_040:
̄When Bundold went through the Reactor, he must've activated the device in this room.
ā
DEMO_210_MSG_050: ̄It's unfortunate we could not receive the original message directly. However, here's what it said...
DEMO_210_MSG_060:
̄"Those of us who have survived, our goal is our final hope, for the sake of opening the path...
ā
DEMO_210_MSG_070: ̄For that reason, you also went to the Grim Tundra... isn't that right, Lucia... ?"
DEMO_210_MSG_080: ̄Received the Security Codes. You can now access the Control System.
